mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM') as DAY, COUNT(A.USER_KEY) as USER_COUNT FROM T_USER A WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUTHORITY IN (10, 19) AND TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY') = #{year} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY DAY ASC
SELECT TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY') as DAY, COUNT(A.USER_KEY) as USER_COUNT FROM T_USER A WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUTHORITY IN (10, 19) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY') ORDER BY DAY ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAY, COUNT(A.USER_KEY) as USER_COUNT FROM T_USER A WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUTHORITY IN (10, 19) AND TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM') = #{month} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY DAY ASC

SELECT C.G_KEY, B.KIND, C.NAME, SUM (DECODE(B.PAY_STATUS, 2, B.J_COUNT)) PAY_CNT, SUM (DECODE(B.PAY_STATUS, 2, B.CALC_PRICE, 0)) PAY_PRICE, SUM (DECODE(B.PAY_STATUS, 8, B.J_COUNT)) CANCEL_CNT, SUM (DECODE(B.PAY_STATUS, 8, B.CALC_PRICE, 0)) CANCEL_PRICE FROM T_CALCULATE A RIGHT JOIN T_CALCULATE_DATA B ON A.CALCULATE_KEY = B.CALCULATE_KEY INNER JOIN T_GOODS C ON B.G_KEY = C.G_KEY WHERE A.TEACHER_KEY = #{teacherKey} AND B.TYPE = #{goodsType} AND A.YEAR_MONTH = #{month} GROUP BY C.G_KEY, B.KIND, C.NAME ORDER BY C.G_KEY ASC

SELECT C.G_KEY, B.KIND, C.NAME, SUM (DECODE(B.PAY_STATUS, 2, B.J_COUNT)) PAY_CNT, SUM (DECODE(B.PAY_STATUS, 2, B.CALC_PRICE, 0)) PAY_PRICE, SUM (DECODE(B.PAY_STATUS, 8, B.J_COUNT)) CANCEL_CNT, SUM (DECODE(B.PAY_STATUS, 8, B.CALC_PRICE, 0)) CANCEL_PRICE FROM T_CALCULATE A RIGHT JOIN T_CALCULATE_DATA B ON A.CALCULATE_KEY = B.CALCULATE_KEY INNER JOIN T_GOODS C ON B.G_KEY = C.G_KEY WHERE A.TEACHER_KEY = #{teacherKey} AND B.TYPE = #{goodsType}
AND TO_CHAR(A.TARGET_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{searchStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
